description: Add two-factor authentication to login process
acceptance_criteria: User receives OTP via email after username/password login. OTP valid for 5 minutes. User enters OTP to complete login. Invalid OTP shows error message.

description: Improve password hashing algorithm for better security
acceptance_criteria: Replace current SHA256 with bcrypt hashing. Existing passwords migrated on next login. Password strength validation added. Hash generation time < 500ms.

description: Implement payment gateway integration for credit card processing
acceptance_criteria: Integrate with Stripe payment gateway. Support credit card and debit card payments. Transaction ID returned for successful payments. Failed payments logged with error codes.

description: Setup autopay enrollment for recurring bills
acceptance_criteria: User can enroll into autopay for selected bills. Autopay processes payments on due date. User notified via email before payment. Users can cancel autopay anytime.

description: Add ability to update user profile information including email and full name
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint allows updating email, full_name fields. Email uniqueness validated. Changes reflected immediately. Audit log created for profile changes.

description: Implement account lockout after multiple failed login attempts
acceptance_criteria: Account locked after 5 failed login attempts within 15 minutes. Lockout duration is 30 minutes. User notified via email upon lockout. Admin can manually unlock accounts.
